member.name: T:Bing.Translator.GetLanguagesResult
member.summary: The list of Language Code / Names and Result Code

member.name: P:Bing.Translator.GetLanguagesResult.Languages
member.summary: the list of language code or names

member.name: P:Bing.Translator.GetLanguagesResult.Code
member.summary: Result Code

member.name: T:Bing.Translator.TranslationResult
member.summary: A string representing the translated text and the Result Code.

member.name: P:Bing.Translator.TranslationResult.TextTranslated
member.summary: A string representing the translated text. If you previously use AddTranslation or AddTranslationArray (through our Public API http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dd576287.aspx) enter a translation with a rating of 5 or higher for the same source sentence, Translate returns only the top choice that is available to your system. The "same source sentence" means the exact same (100% matching), except for capitalization, white space, tag values, and punctuation at the end of a sentence. If no rating is stored with a rating of 5 or above then the returned result will be the automatic translation by Microsoft Translator.

member.name: P:Bing.Translator.TranslationResult.Code
member.summary: Result Code

member.name: F:Bing.Translator.ErrorCode.Input_InvalidCategory
member.summary: Category is invalid. Leave it blank or input a valid category.

member.name: F:Bing.Translator.ErrorCode.Input_InvalidLanguage
member.summary: Language is not supported. Use a supported language code.

member.summary: ClientId or ClientSecret is invalid.

member.summary: Your Azure Subscription token is expired. Check your subscription for more detail.

member.name: F:Bing.Translator.ErrorCode.Input_SentenceTooLong
member.summary: Input sentence is too long. Use a shorter sentence.

member.summary: Internal Error: Service is disabled.

member.summary: Internal Error: Service is temporarily unavailable.

member.name: F:Bing.Translator.ErrorCode.Internal_NoTranslationFound
member.summary: Internal Error: No Translation Found.

member.name: F:Bing.Translator.ErrorCode.Input_IpOverQuota
member.summary: Your IP address is over the throttling quota for using the Translator service. Try again later.

member.name: F:Bing.Translator.ErrorCode.Input_AppIdOverQuota
member.summary: The appId from your Azure subscription is over the throttling quota for using the Translator service. Try again later.

member.name: F:Bing.Translator.ErrorCode.Input_IpBlackList
member.summary: Your IP address has been blacklisted from the Translator service. Contact support for more details.

member.name: F:Bing.Translator.ErrorCode.Input_AppIdBlackList
member.summary: The appId from your Azure subscription has been blacklisted. Contact support for more details.

member.name: F:Bing.Translator.ErrorCode.Input_OAuthInvalidSignature
member.summary: Your Azure Subscription contains an invalid signature. Check your subscription for more details.

member.name: F:Bing.Translator.ErrorCode.Input_OAuthInvalidBearer
member.summary: Your Azure Subscription is invalid. Check your clientId and clientSecret.

member.name: F:Bing.Translator.ErrorCode.Input_ADMInvalidSubscriptionState
member.summary: Your Azure Subscription is in an invalid state. Check your subscription for more detail.

member.name: F:Bing.Translator.ErrorCode.Input_ADMZeroBalance
member.summary: Your Azure Subscription has zero balance. Check your subscription for more detail.

member.name: F:Bing.Translator.ErrorCode.Input_ADMSubscriptionNotFound
member.summary: Your Azure Subscription is not found. Check your subscription for more detail.

member.summary: From Language is invalid. Use a valid language code.

member.summary: this is taken from the MDistributer Error.cs

member.name: F:Bing.Translator.Errors.ERROR_NO_CACHE_ENTRY_FOUND
member.summary: When option cacheonly is used and translation was not found in cache we return this error message

member.name: T:Bing.Translator.TranslatorControl
member.summary: To use the control in the xaml <TranslatorControl ClientId="client" ClientSecret="secret"/> <TextBox Text="{Binding TextToTranslate, ElementName=Translator, Mode=TwoWay}"/> // Mode=TwoWay is needed to send data to the control (instead of just reading from it). <TextBox Text="{Binding TextTranslated, ElementName=Translator}" /> <TextBox Text="{Binding ErrorCode, ElementName=Translator}" />

member.name: M:Bing.Translator.TranslatorControl.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor for Control

member.name: M:Bing.Translator.TranslatorControl.FireCompletedEvent(Bing.Translator.TranslationResult)
member.summary: Fire all the delegates that is attached to the events with the arg

member.name: M:Bing.Translator.TranslatorControl.OnClientIdOrSecretChanged(Windows.UI.Xaml.DependencyObject,Windows.UI.Xaml.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Since ClientId or ClientSecret Changed, we atomically signal the service helper It will create a new one next time it is needed. Reason we don't initialize right away is that we want to wait till both are changed first

member.name: M:Bing.Translator.TranslatorControl.OnTextChanged(Windows.UI.Xaml.DependencyObject,Windows.UI.Xaml.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Each time LanguageFrom, LanguageTo, Category or TextToTranslate is changed We check whether we can perform a translation

member.name: M:Bing.Translator.TranslatorControl.StartTranslation(Bing.Translator.TranslatorControl)
member.summary: Start the translation, if not all parameters are present then no op.

member.name: E:Bing.Translator.TranslatorControl.Completed
member.summary: Event is signaled when translation is completed

member.name: P:Bing.Translator.TranslatorControl.TranslatorApi
member.summary: Translator Library contains methods to communicate with the Bing Translator API

member.name: P:Bing.Translator.TranslatorControl.ClientId
member.summary: ClientId for ADM Authentication. Can be set in Xaml <TranslatorControl ClientId="client" ClientSecret="secret" LanguageFrom="en" LanguageTo="es"/>

member.name: P:Bing.Translator.TranslatorControl.ClientSecret
member.summary: ClientId for ADM Authentication. Can be set in Xaml <TranslatorControl ClientId="client" ClientSecret="secret" LanguageFrom="en" LanguageTo="es"/>

member.name: P:Bing.Translator.TranslatorControl.LanguageFrom
member.summary: Optional. A string representing the language code of the translation text. If left empty the response will include the result of language auto-detection. Can be set in Xaml <TranslatorControl ClientId="client" ClientSecret="secret" LanguageFrom="en" LanguageTo="es"/>

member.name: P:Bing.Translator.TranslatorControl.LanguageTo
member.summary: Required. A string representing the language code to translate the text into. Can be set in Xaml <TranslatorControl ClientId="client" ClientSecret="secret" LanguageFrom="en" LanguageTo="es"/>

member.name: P:Bing.Translator.TranslatorControl.Category
member.summary: Optional. A string containing the category (domain) of the translation. Defaults to "general". Can be set in Xaml <TranslatorControl ClientId="client" ClientSecret="secret" LanguageFrom="en" LanguageTo="es" Category="general"/>

member.name: P:Bing.Translator.TranslatorControl.TextToTranslate
member.summary: Required. A string representing the text to translate. The size of the text must not exceed 10000 characters. In Xaml, example of binding to textbox <TextBox Text="{Binding TextToTranslate, ElementName=Translator, Mode=TwoWay}" /> Mode=TwoWay is needed to send data to the control (instead of just reading from it).

member.name: P:Bing.Translator.TranslatorControl.TextTranslated
member.summary: A string representing the translated text. In Xaml, example of binding to textbox <TextBox Text="{Binding TextToTranslate, ElementName=Translator}" />

member.name: P:Bing.Translator.TranslatorControl.ErrorCode
member.summary: Result Code

member.name: T:Bing.Translator.TranslatorLibrary
member.summary: Translator Library contains methods to communicate with the Bing Translator API

member.name: M:Bing.Translator.TranslatorLibrary.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor for the Translator API Library

member.name: M:Bing.Translator.TranslatorLibrary.TranslateAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Translates a text string from one language to another.
member.param: Optional. A string representing the language code of the translation text. If left empty the response will include the result of language auto-detection.
Required. A string representing the language code to translate the text into.
Optional. A string containing the category (domain) of the translation. Defaults to "general".
Required. A string representing the text to translate. The size of the text must not exceed 10000 characters.
member.returns: A string representing the translated text and the Result Code. If you previously use AddTranslation or AddTranslationArray (through our Public API http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dd576287.aspx) enter a translation with a rating of 5 or higher for the same source sentence, Translate returns only the top choice that is available to your system. The "same source sentence" means the exact same (100% matching), except for capitalization, white space, tag values, and punctuation at the end of a sentence. If no rating is stored with a rating of 5 or above then the returned result will be the automatic translation by Microsoft Translator.

member.name: M:Bing.Translator.TranslatorLibrary.GetLanguagesAsync
member.summary: Obtain a list of language codes representing languages that are supported by the Translation Service. TranslateAsync() can translate between any of these languages.
member.returns: A string array containing the language codes supported by the Translator Services and the Result Code

member.name: M:Bing.Translator.TranslatorLibrary.GetLanguageNamesAsync(System.String,Windows.Foundation.Collections.IIterable{System.String})
member.summary: Retrieves friendly names for the languages passed in languageCodes, and localized the passed locale language.
member.param: Required. A string representing a combination of an ISO 639 two-letter lowercase culture code associated with a language and an ISO 3166 two-letter uppercase subculture code to localize the language names or a ISO 639 lowercase culture code by itself.
Required. A string array representing the ISO 639-1 language codes to retrieve the friendly name for.
member.returns: A string array containing languages names supported by the Translator Service, localized into the requested language and result code.

member.name: M:Bing.Translator.TranslatorLibrary.ReturnUnauthorizedResult``1
member.summary: helper method to return the unathorized result code

member.summary: ReadOnly Client Id for ADM Authentication
